reviews.review: Лучший проект для заработка денег. Можно хорошо убить время играя с друзьями. Читеры конечно бесят но если играешь с друзьями то игра самый лучший выбор.
Bu oyunda birinin hile olduğunu mu düşünüyosunuz evet o kişi hile
This game gave me back my virginity and i cannot explain how relieved I am.
oyunda hile var hurda yok anlatmaya da gerek yok ben zevk alırım diyorsan gir.

АХУЕНАЯ ИГРА СТАВЛЮ ЛАЙК ХОЧУ УМЕРЕТЬ

This game is just really bad. I've played for three hours, and I'm already good at it, because it takes very little skill. For example, with Team Fortress 2, which I have hundreds of hours on, I still don't top score too much. The movement is awful, you accelerate and decelerate way too slowly, and every single gun in the game requires you to zoom in or crouch just for it to be useful. Jumping is almost entirely worthless too, since it slows you to a halt. The only thing good about this game is that it runs on the Source engine, so you can actually tinker with it a bit and make maps for example, but other than that it's really bad.

игра вообще не тянет, хотя раньше всё норм было под 80 фп было

This is one of those iconic games that is in everyones heart, now that its free all I have to say is just get it.  Very good movement, many many maps, very strong community still over 10 years later.  Just an all around balanced game!
